name: Short Fuse (itch) (taliyos, ken10wil, Chad VanPatten, Mike)
name_original: Short Fuse (itch) (taliyos, ken10wil, Chad VanPatten, Mike)
description:
For one reason or another, your employer has a LOT of bombs. And because you signed the paperwork (not that you knew what you were getting into), you need to defuse each and every bomb! Did we mention that these bombs are all about to explode? Don't worry, all you need to do is snip the red wires. Good luck!

--- How To Play ---

Select bombs by clicking on them

Snip wires by clicking on them

Zoom bomb with the scroll wheel

Rotate bomb by dragging on the bomb

--- Credits ---

Created in one week! This is the second project for GSAS-4510 | Experimental Game Design at RPI, Spring 2023.
